Title: ExifGlass 1.2
Description:
- Adds support for ImageGlass 9.0 beta 5.
- Adds support for extracting embedded thumbnail via context menu.
- Improves viewing long text data by auto-wrapping tag value
-Fixed a bug where ExifGlass shows `-- press ENTER --` message when using the default filename of ExifTool: exiftool(-k).exe
